key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting net interest margins and loan origination volumes
Cybersecurity risks including system failures and data breaches
Regulatory compliance increasing operational costs and complexity
Capital management concerns with below-peer-average capital ratios
Competitive pressures from larger national banks, credit unions, and fintech companies
controversies: Data breach incidents highlighting cybersecurity vulnerabilities
social_issues: Potential risks related to incidents that could negatively impact stakeholders or the environment

sources.title: KBRA Affirms Ratings for Univest Financial Corporation
sources.snippet: We consider UVSP adequately insulated to absorb reasonable credit costs given reserves of 1.30% of loans as of 4Q23, combined with the company's solid earnings and capital position.
